--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> what if you use other methodes of gaining up exp without cheeting 
(like 
> raising ghosts) also what exactly are we trying to get? the must 
exp? the 
> most worth of your teem? the must points?

If I have anything to do with picking/editing scenarios, there will be 
no way to end with an archmage by the end of the tournament and/or end 
with a cleric who could summon skeletons without cheating.

The goal of the tournament is a good question.  I propose defining it 
as the most points, since that does not count experience gained by a 
cleric healing other teammates.  IMHO, the 1st tie-breaker should be 
advancing the team WITHOUT clerics, since that team obviously had a 
harder time.  Some possible tie-breaker factors would be teams without 
ghosts, skeletons, elves, or mages.  That one is about teams having a 
harder time getting to gold, silver, or opponents.
